move.name: Cane Hit
move.description: Smacks opponent in the head using a cane

move.name: Triple-Hit
move.description: Three swift blows done using a cane.

move.name: Scrape
move.description: Scratch the enemy hard, once.

move.name: Slash
move.description: Swipe the enemy using both hands.

move.name: Slick Stab
move.description: Cut the enemy with your knife.

move.name: Bloody Strike
move.description: Brutally stab the enemy with your knife.

move.name: Hardy Fist
move.description: Punch the enemy with your fist.

move.name: Mega Punch
move.description: Uppercut the enemy in the jaw.

move.name: Chilling Breath
move.description: Rain a flurry of icicles from your mouth onto the enemy.

move.name: Iced Wing
move.description: Slash the enemy with the use of cold wings.

move.name: Wraith of Flames
move.description: Summons flames from the fiery pits.

move.name: Wraith of Thunder
move.description: Summon bolts of thunder from the heavens.

move.name: Wraith of Ice
move.description: Summons a quick but heavy blizzard onto the field.

move.name: Sacred Sword
move.description: Enhances your sword for a brief moment, and strikes the enemy.

move.name: Gamma Pulse
move.description: A light stream erupts from your sword.

move.name: Flamethrower
move.description: Sprays the enemy in flames.

move.name: Fire Spin
move.description: Summons a tornado made of flames, engulfing the enemy.

move.name: Bullet Spray
move.description: Use your entire magizine of bullets simultaneously.

move.name: Frostbite
move.description: Pierce the enemy

move.name: Big-Bang
move.description: Wack your enemy (cling-clonguiwefuiwbef).

move.name: Striking Arrows
move.description: Aim 3 arrows at the enemy consecutively.

move.name: Wood Hammer
move.description: Bash a stick into your enemy.
